name: Bryan Mark
description: Well first of all let me introduce my self, I am Originally from Barlin, Germany, I live all my live in the USA I am from Cleveland Ohio, I am a widow I lost my wife three years ago she died of breast cancer. I work as a GOLD MINING Contractor, I Export And Import Yellow Gold Dust, and have a lot of Client over seas that I Work with. I own my house and I have a car, I have a truck, and I live alone
